(Zardus also provided me with this guy temporarily.  I'd give the list of the 
people I have, but I'm not on my computer, so I can't)

Perndabot:



Perndabot yelled to himself as he heard Bright Blade say she was in trouble.  
"Slagging Maxis!" he took off into the air, his speed increasing, sending him 
towards the Cybertronian Fire, slowly leaving the desert.  Not even pondering 
how he was going to actually get into the Maximal base and aid Bright Blade.
